title: Mystery Gift Exchanging!
body:
Hey All!

Want to buy yourself a mystery gift but have nobody to buy it for you? Add me and we can buy each other the gifts :) Have a shiz load of RP.

IGN: TheBeastNZ

replies.body: Don't have any RP sorry otherwise I would of loved to. Be careful though I don't recommend doing this with strangers. Many people have been tricked into gifting and not getting anything back.

> [{quoted}](name=Krawia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=3VTPzT8v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-27T01:48:42.594+0000)
>
> Don't have any RP sorry otherwise I would of loved to. Be careful though I don't recommend doing this with strangers. Many people have been tricked into gifting and not getting anything back.

i would not trust this guy
